thread.title: Donald Trump Superfan's TV Interview Gets Remixed To Eminem's 'Stan'
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Superfan's TV Interview Gets Remixed To Eminem's 'Stan'

author: Lee Moran
title: Donald Trump Superfan's TV Interview Gets Remixed To Eminem's 'Stan'
text:
Donald Trump Superfan's TV Interview Gets Remixed To Eminem's 'Stan' "Mr. President, I’ve been with you for two years, you’ve probably heard this." Donald Trump devotee Gene Huber’s gushing CNN interview about the president has been given an Eminem twist. Over the weekend, Twitter user @BeardedGenius remixed parts of Huber’s effusive comments about Trump over the Detroit rapper’s 2000 hit “ Stan ” ― which is about an obsessed fan writing to his idol. Check out the clip here: Trump supporter feat. Dido pic.twitter.com/ZgfIwvuzDz — Nooruddean (@BeardedGenius) February 19, 2017 
The mashup has since gone viral, and even been tweeted by singer and actor Josh Groban. Eminem, who called Trump a “bitch” in a verse on Big Sean’s new track “No Favors,” has so far not commented. 
Huber enthusiastically praised Trump on Saturday after the president had earlier invited him onstage at his campaign-style rally in Melbourne, Florida. 
In the interview, the 47-year-old car salesman also revealed he had a 6-foot cardboard cutout of the president in his house that he salutes “every single day.” The Best Vistor I could ever have!President Trump came to Florida to see me! Wow, never will forget this!@realDonaldTrump @thebestcloser pic.twitter.com/galTF85biz — Gene Huber (@Squeakey6) January 9, 2017 Related Coverage
